pages.text: $(li)The Shield Of The Deep is better than common $(l:patchouli:weapons/shield)Shields$(/l) because its durability.$(br)$(li)When any creature hits The Shield Of The Deep, it is inflicted with Exsanguination effect, inflicting it damage.

pages.name: Shield Of The Deep
pages.text: To equip it, just open your inventory and place the Shield into your left hand slot
